name: Pineapple Haze
description: Pineapple Haze combines the tropical aroma of Pineapple with the racing cerebral energy of Haze, creating a mostly sativa strain with equally enticing flavors and effects. Its tall plants bloom with large colas that look and smell much like pineapples. The Haze influence leads the charge when it comes to Pineapple Haze’s effects, lending a creative and energetic spark that can be harnessed day or night.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Happy, Uplifted, Focused, Fatigue, Eye Pressure, Depression, Stress, Lack of Appetite, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Headache, Paranoid
